title: Stop making creating new champs and fix Bronze already!
body: Every month Riot comes out with these champs or patches or messing with the items. Most of the champs suck, Taliyah is not good at all. The patches are glitch ridden, and they keep screwing around with the items. Yet, nothing is done about people who cannot play always dragging down teams. Until they change that, ranked with get even less popular than it is.

replies.body:
there is no fixing bronze. youre the bottom of the barrel, and you the players down there are whats broken, not the game. even considering dynamic boosts being common this season, you should still be able to make it to silver and gold on your own.

you have to fix yourselves.

I am playing at a S level. I can do no more than what I am doing. They are giving up an average of 16 deaths. It's them not me. Mine is around 4.5 in my last 10 games. It's them. All the numbers says it them. You said should and maybe. Maybe if you didn't guess all the time you wouldn't right the crap you just wrote.

And are you always this toxic in your matches?

If so, then that is why you are still a Bronzie.
no I usually mute the 4 randoms I play with. Let's see your match history.

I don't play ranked... And here's why... I only play League to have fun. Ranked is for serious play.

League is for me to unwind from work and enjoy the game with other ppl from the NA. 

But I don't have to be ranked to know that Bronze can be easy to get out of. I have ppl on my friends list that practically got out of Bronze in a few days.

Since, you don't play ranked you wouldn't know the state of it. Therefore, you aren't qualified to have opinion on it. You have fun in normals and stay out ranked business.  

You have two friends and they were lucky and it was due to placements. I mean really....

Never said 2. In fact I have over 30 friends of ppl i met on here. 15 of which play ranked.

And I did ranked during Preseason. It took me all of 2 days to get to Silver. So i'd say i'm well qualified to have an opinion.

Perhaps if you were less toxic, you'd find teams more willing to work with you.
Most teams suck and never play. I am not toxic when it comes to games. I don't do curse or skype. So, stop telling flat out lies.

Toxic is not limited to cursing.

On here, you are attacking anyone that disagrees with you. That is toxic.

Perhaps if you didn't mute your team at the beginning, y'all could communicate and work together.


Cause that is the problem right there, you have 0 communication with your team.

If you can't back up a word you say, then is it my fault. I mute them because they are fighting most of the time. They don't work together, I don't get teams. You don't seem to get it.

I would have to get a team, to be able to work with them. But that doesn't happen but of course you are just going to keep reaching in order to blame me.

I only go by what i see on here and you've already stated you mute them...plus if you actually look at your own comments, they are you attacking the other people just because they disagree with you.


Let's see your proof that all Bronzes don't work with others.

Why would I not mute people who argue and fight and who are toxic don't effect my game?

My proof are the games. I am playing well enough to win. My team is not.

It doesn't matter if they are fighting...working with a team even in troubling matches is the proof of a good player.

I main support, do you really think players I am in matches with don't blame me for mistakes they make or are constantly fighting?

I just deal with it and continue working with them to try to get a victory (and this is Norms). We don't always win but at the end of the day, I know that we did the best we could.

The same still holds in Ranked. Communicate with your team, work with them to win lanes, do the best y'all can, praise allies for good jobs (a good word goes a long way and does gain trust with allies) but don't attack them for mistakes. Giving a pointer instead can be better.

Those are the points of good players.

What do you think a Support does a lot?

They have to listen to toxic ppl and don't have the liberty to mute them.

And you know what happens, they help turn a match around.

So if we can't call them a team. I guess the NFL can't have teams since a lot of them fight and argue.

you don't listen. They don't play as team, therefore we can't call them a team. Please keep up an don't spam the same thing. You try communication with people who curse you out all the time. I am not talking to jerks.

I just saw my friend play Kha'Zix in a bronze game.

He was diamond.

He destroyed everyone.

If you were diamond, you'd climb, but since you are a true bronze, you don't.

However, this season due to dynamic queue, things like diamonds carrying their bronze friends is totally acceptable and cool.

You saw one game. I have done that before. Once and even twice but let me see him "DESTROY" all five of them when they are together pushing mid he cannot! DIamond or not. He couldn't do it from Bronze 5 to B1 100%

> [{quoted}](name=Lywoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9E8W04fZ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-21T04:59:32.274+0000)
>
> You saw one game. I have done that before. Once and even twice but let me see him "DESTROY" all five of them when they are together pushing mid he cannot! DIamond or not. He couldn't do it from Bronze 5 to B1 100%

to be perfectly honest, i got demoted to bronze 3 and it took me less then a wee to get out with no effort. As long as you are using hyper carries you can get out of bronze very easily. For example, first picked fizz and their team had light CC and even with 20+ kills no one built MR and that pretty much sums up bronze games.

Well, one I don't believe you. Two, you couldn't do so with my teams. You would have 4 teammates in double digits some with 3/20 KD. You wouldn't climb under such conditions. Fizz or not. You would get 1 vs 3 all game and you wouldn't have 20 kills. So, just stop.

> [{quoted}](name=Lywoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9E8W04fZ,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-21T05:06:00.097+0000)
>
> Well, one I don't believe you. Two, you couldn't do so with my teams. You would have 4 teammates in double digits some with 3/20 KD. You wouldn't climb under such conditions. Fizz or not. You would get 1 vs 3 all game and you wouldn't have 20 kills. So, just stop.

One, i don't really care if you do or not. Two, it doesn't matter if your team is bad if you are picking hyper carries and ganking. 3, if they are feeding that hard they stop being worth much after the 3rd death however the enemy becomes worth a lot of team gold. Fourth, at this point you are just fishing for reasons that you are bad.
doesn't take much to win 1v3s with certain champions, the worse the enemy players are the easier they are to win.
well you keep asmuing the enemy is bad. They play together my team doesn't and guess what, if they sitck together and push you can't kill all of them. I don't care how good you are. You will lose.

Considering you are talking about playing with Bronze players, assuming they are bad is correct.

Otherwise, they wouldn't be in Bronze.
Lmao bruh maybe if you didn't mute all 4 of the randoms you get paired with your team would work together much better Kappa

he does that on his smurf all the time. I do it all the time too in normals.  Just so you know what diamond means:

diamond is at least 2000 MMR, bronze is sub 1100. Each 100 points of MMR difference is a usually a 10% win rate but you are so far below a diamond that MMR can no longer accurately describe how often a diamond wins against you.
oh okay. I still don't believe a word what you say. So, please show me a recorded game of you winning 1 vs 5 the whole game.

you can either take advice from someone who has been, still is and will be for the foreseeable future, far higher in elo than you are, or complain about why you are bad. Someone is plat, and someone is bronze. Something distinguishes the plat from the bronze. If nothing distinguished them, then the bronze could be plat, and the plat could be bronze, but that's not the case. I have never even seen bronze on this account.
Your advice doesn't work nor does it fit the situation. Why don't you actually view a game? Oh wait, you rather make crap up!
Are you talking about only Bronze or all of low elo? Bronze - Gold
I am talking about just Bronze.
and of course your path was eaiser than mine so......

replies.poster: J E B A Å‚ T E D
replies.body: Bronze

You can't fix bronze because bronze isn't the problem. 

You can't fix bad/stupid.

That being said if you play better than a bronze player you'll climb out. Yes your team is full of bad bronzies, but so is the enemy team. Just capitalize on the stupid things the enemies do.

The emeny team sticks together mine doesn't, my team makes way more mistakes and is worse than the enemy. I do capitalize on their their mistakes, that's why I keep getting S and -S. I know what I am doing, go tell them this stuff. I have been right all along, it's them.

Can't win them all. But if you're better than bronze, all you need is to win 1 more game then you lose and you'll be ou . 

If you're stuck in bronze, it's where you belong.

Wrong on both counts. You wouldn't be able to winwith your team giving up 16 deaths and sometime higher. You just don't believe in any sort of reality, do you? Let's see how good you are......

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=reketdealk

2 wins 4 losses.

1-9-9 with Ali
 0-5-3 with Taric


u aren't a very good support and you aren't carrying. You are actually making your team lose with your poor play and you are only Silver 3. Don't talk anymore.

Everyone has bad games. You took the 2 worst ones I had to prove that even at my worst, I still can be higher elo than you.

So your point is what exactly?

My point is the nature of support is to basically get carried.  You only have 6 games on there. You good Ali game is a outliner. I once got 7 kills with Soraka, It's not going to happen every game. 

And those clearly proved I am better player than you. You simply got carried by a team, you play support. Try not going 2-4 and then talking about good you are.

> [{quoted}](name=Lywoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9E8W04fZ,comment-id=000500000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-05-21T06:29:39.785+0000)

If you were better, you'd be out of bronze.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Lyless

Try not going 5/15 then talk about how good you are.
I don't think i have ever seen an MMR rating that low before, lol

Hahaha. And if you were better u would be playing support and losing. I am playing great. My team is losing the games. I can't play 1 vs 9. I don't know anything that can.

And if you were better you wouldn't be S3. And you will be in Bronze in no time. Keep getting carried.

> [{quoted}](name=Lywoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9E8W04fZ,comment-id=00050000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-21T06:38:06.614+0000)

Not a thing you just said makes sense. If I was better I wouldn't lose. 

I never said I was better than where I am. Just better than you.

And if I keep getting carried I won't sink to bronze. 


You're the one playing it 1v9. Ever think that is the problem?

Ok, can you carry teams that give up double digit kills? No you can't because you are a support. I don't believe you are better that me. Give me a silver team and you one and my team will win. 

And I am playing the hand that's dealt. The team won't push and just chases kills and doesn't go for turrets. I am done begging them to do that. I just shut it off.

Two words....Support Karma.

Her damage can be astronomical and cam actually take down 5 enemies with a Mantra'd Q.
I was gone 16/4 and have been in the same spot. You have no point. Stop hiding in a support role!
You got a problem with Supports?
most of them, yes.
lmao fkn rkt nrd

lmao you are bronze 5 and looking people up to criticize them? I notice you are very silent when plats and diamonds tell you that you are bad. Why is that? Why do you only retaliate against silvers who are still hundreds of MMR higher than you and have 90% win rates against people in your elo?

Even though I say I cannot distinguish bronze from silver, that's from my perspective. A silver can most certainly distinguish bronze from silver.
